text.name: T Corp. Accelerated Amputator
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Vibration] Count
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 6 [Vibration] on target (max 2)

Inflict ([Vibration] consumed - 1) [Binding] next turn

text.name: I Command Thee, Halt!
text.desc:
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Vibration], Clash Power +1
[WhenUse] Consume 10 [Vibration] Count on self to gain Coin Power +2
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 2 [Vibration]

[OnSucceedAttack] If target has 10+ [Vibration], consume 10 [Vibration] on target and inflict 2 [TimeSuspend]
- If this unit is in a [TimeRentalTwoPersonality] state, this effect does not consume the target's [Vibration]
[OnSucceedAttack] If target's Speed is slower than this unit's, trigger [Switch_Vibration] into [VibrationChainPersonality]

text.name: I Command Thee, Halt!
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 6 [Vibration] on target (max 2)
[WhenUse] If target has [Binding], gain Clash Power +1
[WhenUse] Consume 10 [Vibration] Count on self to gain Coin Power +2
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 2 [Vibration]
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 3 [Vibration]

[OnSucceedAttack] If target has 10+ [Vibration], consume 10 [Vibration] on target and inflict 2 [TimeSuspend]
- If this unit is in a [TimeRentalTwoPersonality] state, this effect does not consume the target's [Vibration]
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
[OnSucceedAttack] If target's Speed is slower than this unit's, trigger [Switch_Vibration] into [VibrationChainPersonality]

text.name: I Shall Summon the Time
text.desc:
[StartBattle] If this unit is not in a [TimeRentalTwoPersonality] state, gain 4 [TimeRentalTwoPersonality] at Turn End (once per turn)
[WhenUse] For this turn: when hit by an enemy, inflict 2 [Vibration] on target next turn (2 times per turn)

text.name: I Shall Summon the Time
text.desc:
[StartBattle] If this unit is not in a [TimeRentalTwoPersonality] state, gain 4 [TimeRentalTwoPersonality] at Turn End (once per turn)
[WhenUse] For this turn: when hit by an enemy, inflict 3 [Vibration] on target next turn (6 times per turn)

1030921.name: T Corp. Physics Distortion Field
1030921.desc: When 1 ally with the slowest Speed takes damage from enemies with [Vibration], take -10% damage

1030901.name: Golden Time - Extracting
1030901.desc:
Turn End: If this unit's HP is between 10% ~ 20%, instantly heal 80% of this unit's max HP, and recover from Stagger. (once per Encounter)

When this unit loses [TimeRentalTwoPersonality], gain +8 [Aggro] to one of this unit's Skill Slots next turn
